text: 47:29-30 Jenesis 49:29-32; 50:6A fo, a gurumram ovengam, egha a uan otarim Josepɨn diazɨ, a ize. Ezɨ a kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ guizbangɨra bar na gifuegh, uan dafarim isɨ nan buarakɨrimɨn apengan amadagh, akar dɨkɨrɨzir gavgavim damigh suam, nɨ bar arazir aghuimɨn na damuam. Nɨ Isipɨn kantrin narafan kogham.
